net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter

  • Classes in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter used by net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics 
    Class and Description
    Filter
    A FunctionalInterface which is used to filter a Sprite, and defines the rule(s) for determining the values for each pixel.
  • Classes in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter used by net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter 
    Class and Description
    Filter
    A FunctionalInterface which is used to filter a Sprite, and defines the rule(s) for determining the values for each pixel.
    GrayscaleFilter
    A Filter which applies a gray-scale effect to the Sprite.
  • Classes in net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter used by net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter.dynamic 
    Class and Description
    AdjustFilter
    A Filter which adjusts the percentage of all three RGB channels in the Sprite.
    Filter
    A FunctionalInterface which is used to filter a Sprite, and defines the rule(s) for determining the values for each pixel.
